attributes.action: For our 73 UK MEPs to call for the suspension of Polish MEP Janusz Korwin-Mikke.
attributes.background:
During a gender pay-gap debate, Polish MEP Janusz Korwin-Mikke said that women should earn less than men because they are smaller, weaker and less intelligent.
As someone who strongly believes in gender equality, I found this comments very offensive and I would like my MEP to represent that.

rejection.details:
It would be for each individual UK MEP to decide whether to do this. 

You can find out how to contact MEPs here: http://www.europarl.org.uk/en/your-meps/uk_meps.html
